summary_text: Adnan and Hicran are happily married however when their son die as a result of a mysterious accident Adanan becomes distant from his wife. Hicran starts investigating her past to see how it could connect to the death of her son.

name: Undercurrent
summary_text: Middle-aged bride Ann Hamilton soon begins to suspect that her charming husband is really a psychotic who plans to murder her.

name: Ghoomketu
summary_text: An aspiring writer from a small town in U.P. runs away to Mumbai. He gives himself 30 days to try and prove his worth.

summary_text: The growing friendship of two NYC longshoremen is threatened by a notably repellent punk.

name: Clapham Junction
summary_text: A chronicle of 36 hours in the lives of a number of interconnected gay men in Clapham, South London.

name: Smother
summary_text: After being fired from his job, an everyday guy faces pressure from his wife about having a baby, while having to deal with his suffocating mother, who has decided to move in with the couple.

name: The Touch of Satan
summary_text: A young man meets a farm girl who is actually a witch.

name: Undiscovered
summary_text: A group of aspiring entertainers try to establish careers for themselves in the city of Los Angeles.

name: Prince of Space
summary_text: When an alien force tries to invade Earth to steal a powerful new rocket fuel, a mysterious hero intervenes.

name: In Name Only
summary_text: After a wealthy man finds out his wife is a gold digger, he meets and falls for a widowed mother, and complications ensue.

name: My Name Is Julia Ross

summary_text: John Peterson lives with his partner Eric and their adopted daughter in Southern California. When he is visited by his aging father Willis from Los Angeles who is searching for a place to retire, their two very different worlds collide.

name: 4 Minute Mile
summary_text: A former track coach decides to train a student with natural athletic talent. Tragedy strikes, forcing the student to confront everything that has been holding him back.

name: Jinnah
summary_text: The story of Jinnah, the founder of Pakistan.

name: Coonskin
summary_text: Rabbit, a country-born trickster, takes over the organized crime racket in Harlem, facing opposition from the institutionalized racism of the Mafia and corrupt police.

summary_text: Zenon Martyniuk, a boy from the Podlasie village, who realizes his great dream is to sing and entertain the crowds. It shows Zenek's path to enormous success, which he achieved thanks to persistence and hard work.

name: Day Zero
summary_text: The military draft is back, three best friends are drafted and given 30 days to report for duty. In that time, they're forced to confront everything they believe about courage, duty, love, friendship and honor.

summary_text: A renowned psychiatrist has selected six mental patients to interview as part of the research for his new book. As he begins his unorthodox methods the question becomes, who really belongs in Spring Valley Mental Hospital?

summary_text: In the well-to-do suburbs of a small town, a group of pretty average, well-adjusted sixteen and seventeen year olds are ordinary adolescents who take a singular path.

name: Catch Hell
summary_text: A fading Hollywood pretty-boy gets taken and brutalized in Louisiana by two local men with his total ruination at heart.

name: Kuan meun ho
summary_text: A couple who met in South Korea. They had fun together but when they both fell in love, everything changed.

name: Swamp Shark
summary_text: An animal smuggling deal goes wrong, resulting in a large shark escaping into the swampy backwoods river.

name: Dilwale
summary_text: A police officer finds out the truth about a mental patient and helps him bring the perpetrators to justice.

summary_text: In a Sicilian town signed by countless problems provoked by a rampant dishonesty, the inhabitants elect a major which promises order and legality. But the truth is that the town (and Italy) is corrupted and dishonest beyond redemption.

name: Six Pack
summary_text: A race car driver is driving to a race in a motor home with his race car on a trailer. His car gets stripped of parts. He ends up with 6 orphan kids on his way to the race.

name: The Last Note
summary_text: The execution of 200 Greek resistance fighters and Communists by the German occupiers on May 1st, 1944 in Kaisariani, as reprisal for the Greek Resistance ambush against Nazis.

name: Black Souls
summary_text: The story of three brothers, the sons of a shepherd, close to the ndrangheta and of their divided soul.

summary_text: A young girl whose father died in the Vietnam War becomes determined to find out more about him and his experiences.

name: Journey of the Hyena

summary_text: After learning his brother died on a mission in Romania, a former soldier teams up with two allies to hunt down a mysterious enemy and exact revenge.

summary_text: A Belgian business executive takes on his country's justice system after a procedural error that released his wife's murderer drives him to take matters into his own hands.

name: Jimmy P: Psychotherapy Of A Plains Indian
summary_text: A troubled Native American veteran forms an extraordinary friendship with his maverick French psychoanalyst as they try to find a cure to his suffering.

summary_text: Follows the excesses and deprivation of life. Complexes, phobias, obsessions, traumas, fears, sex are aired in a group therapy against obesity.

name: Girl
summary_text: A straight-A teen explores Portland's rock scene.

name: Te quiero, imbécil
summary_text: Marcos' life turns upside down after he loses the same day his girlfriend and his job. Marcos' life turns wild after to meet Raquel.

name: Uyare
summary_text: Pallavi is a strong-willed woman who has always aspired to become a pilot. How she gets back on her feet through sheer resilience after being beset by a series of personal crises forms the crux of the film.

name: Spanish Movie
summary_text: A spoof of contemporary Spanish movies.

name: Sixty Six
summary_text: A boy's barmitzvah looks set to be a disaster when it coincides with the 1966 World Cup Final.

name: Madame Satã
summary_text: Loose portrait of João Francisco dos Santos, also known as Madame Satã, a sometime chef, transvestite, lover, father, hero and convict from Rio de Janeiro.

name: Arachnid
summary_text: After a man who lived on an island is wounded. A bunch of dudes, and some chick investigate what could have done that.

name: Désirée

summary_text: As Cheryl's husband continues to ogle other women and Claire's daughter and grandson leave, the ladies decide they deserve a trip to Paris.

name: La noche de los girasoles

summary_text: A band of mercenaries led by Captain Curry travel through war-torn Congo across deadly terrain, battling rival armies, to steal $50 million in uncut diamonds. But infighting, sadistic rebels and a time lock jeopardize everything.

summary_text: A family together with their grandpa go on a vacation, when their new car won't stop and it nearly escapes crashing into a hundred cars.

name: Sabirni centar
summary_text: During the excavation of ancient Roman ruins, an old archaeology professor accidentally opens the gate between our world and the world of the dead.

name: Oh! What a Lovely War

name: The Adventurers
summary_text: The world's top thieves join forces to pull off the heist of a lifetime. But when they find themselves pursued across Europe by a legendary French detective, they'll have to take their game to the next level.

summary_text: A group of young Cardboard Gangsters attempt to gain control of the drug trade in Darndale, chasing the glorified lifestyle of money, power and sex.
A gangster deputes two of his men to recover money from an out of town compulsive gambler.

name: Warm Springs
summary_text: The stirring true story of Franklin D. Roosevelt's battle with polio in 1921.

name: Taarzan: The Wonder Car

name: Marie Antoinette
summary_text: The tragic life of Marie Antoinette, who became queen of France in her late teens.

summary_text: When a naively innocent, aspiring actress arrives on the Broadway scene, she is taken under the wing of several theater veterans who mentor her to ultimate success.

summary_text: A maniacal murderer kills tourists in the woods.

name: Body Melt

summary_text: When a demon god steals the Hammer of Invincibility, Thor strikes a mighty blow to get it back.

name: Man jeuk

summary_text: Four best men pick up their friend, the groom, outside prison. On the way to the chapel, they stop at a bank and get involved in a robbery. The bank's surrounded. FBI takes over.

name: The Sense of Wonder

summary_text: An unhappily married couple find love in strange situations.

name: Let the Corpses Tan

name: Five Dolls for an August Moon

summary_text: Nancy becomes increasingly convinced she was kidnapped as a child. When she meets a couple whose daughter went missing thirty years ago, reasonable doubts give way to willful belief.

summary_text: In this sci-fi tinged story of young love and teenage turmoil, a mysterious glowing ball offers Norimichi a second chance at securing his dream date.

summary_text: Cesar is in love with Rosalie. But Rosalie isn't making it easy for him, especially when her old flame enters the picture.

summary_text: Three men of varying social standing - a viceroy, a bullfighter, and a soldier - vie for the affections of an actress in 18th-century Peru.

summary_text: A group of rangers go camping on unfamiliar forest grounds. All's well until the group members start getting killed by a cunning killer in the woods.

summary_text: After her mother dies, fourteen-year-old Marion falls in love with her stepfather, Remy.

name: Dreams
summary_text: Two different women - a young photo model and her boss - dream about a happy life with beloved men. Their dreams are as different as they are.

name: The Devil Bat

name: Killer Movie
summary_text: A reality TV director copes with a spoiled celebutante and a show gone haywire when a masked killer starts bumping off the crew in this slasher-movie satire.

name: Their Eyes Were Watching God

name: Happiness Is in the Field
summary_text: Francis, the boss of a small plumbing supply company, is harassed by tax collectors, striking employees, and an impossible wife and daughter. His only joy is sharing lunch with his friend ...                See full summary »

name: Rembetiko
summary_text: The story of a group of Rembetes, singers and musicians of the Greek equivalent to the blues, in the early decades of the 20th century, seen through the eyes of a young female singer.

name: Lovesick
summary_text: The story of Charlie Darby, who has everything going for him: a great job, friends, family, the whole package. The one thing Charlie doesn't have is love, because every time he gets close, he goes clinically insane. When he meets the perfect girl, Charlie must overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love.

name: Scar
summary_text: Joan Burrows returns to her hometown for her niece's graduation, only to be confronted by the serial killer she thought she offed years ago -- after he kidnapped and tormented her and killed her best friend.

name: Soldier
summary_text: The story follows a young man (Bobby Deol) who flees India and arrives in Australia seeking vengence for something that started in India. In Australia he meets and falls in love with the daughter of a rich and powerful man(Suresh Oberoi). The story keeps the covers on Bobby Deols plan until the end when everything is revealed as to why he is a SOLDIER.

name: Eddie and the Cruisers II: Eddie Lives!
summary_text: A Montreal construction worker joins a band and turns out to be a long-lost rock star from 1960s New Jersey - none other than Eddie Wilson, who mysteriously disappeared after a road accident.

name: Within Our Gates

name: Pity
summary_text: The story of a man who feels happy only when he is unhappy, a man addicted to sadness, who has such need for pity, he's willing to do everything to evoke it from others. This is the life of a man in a world not cruel enough for him.

name: Kadhalum Kadanthu Pogum
summary_text: An unlikely romance brews between a tough-acting thug with a tender heart, and a recently single, IT consultant neighbor, in this lighthearted and wacky twist of a romantic comedy.

name: Badges of Fury

summary_text: A story about four brothers from a poor family who need to fight to follow their dreams.

name: Paradise

name: Pushover
summary_text: Undercover cop falls for the beautiful moll of a bank robber on the run and together they plan to double-cross the hood and the cops.

name: Ninnu Kori
summary_text: Two lovers, Pallavi and Uma get separated by circumstances, but reconnect years later, when Pallavi is happily married to someone else.

name: Violet Evergarden: Eternity and the Auto Memories Doll
summary_text: Violet Evergarden, a former soldier returned from war, comes to teach at a women's academy and changes a young girl's life.

name: 49 Up
summary_text: Director Michael Apted revisits the same group of British-born adults after a 7 year wait. The subjects are interviewed as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the last seven years.

name: The Siege of Firebase Gloria
summary_text: A tough sergeant and his sidekick roll into a demoralized firebase and proceed to rebuild morale and fortifications in advance of the climactic battle with the VietCong.

name: The House on Telegraph Hill
summary_text: Concentration camp survivor Victoria Kowelska finds herself involved in mystery, greed, and murder when she assumes the identity of a dead friend in order to gain passage to America.

name: Angry Indian Goddesses
summary_text: A photographer invites her closest friends to vacation at her family's home in Goa in celebration of her upcoming marriage.

name: Torment
summary_text: Two parents find themselves fighting to get their little boy back from a sadistic cult, who have stolen him and plan on dark ideas.

name: O chyom eshchyo govoryat muzhchiny
summary_text: Four friends are forced to stay put in a radio station on New Year's Eve after one of them gets into trouble. They use the opportunity to remember the past, talk about women, music, and decisions they had made throughout their lives.

name: William & Kate
summary_text: At university, Prince William and Kate Middleton fall in love. However, their relationship becomes strained under intense media scrutiny.

name: Manson Family Vacation
summary_text: Two brothers tour Charles Manson murder sites. One is a devoted family man. One is devoted to The Family.

name: Om
summary_text: Satya, the son of a pious priest turns into a rowdy and enters into the underworld for the sake of love.

name: Jack & Diane
summary_text: Diane's feelings for Jack -- the girl she met over the summer -- begin to manifest themselves in terrifying ways when she learns that her friend will soon be moving away.

name: Ciske the Rat
summary_text: A poor 11-year-old schoolboy with a heart of gold grows up in 1930s Amsterdam.

name: Ride the Pink Horse
summary_text: WW2 veteran Lucky Gagin arrives in a New Mexico border-town intent on revenging against mobster Frank Hugo but FBI agent Bill Retz, who also wants Hugo, tries to keep Gagin out of trouble.

name: Kevin Hart: Zero F**ks Given
summary_text: Kevin Hart comedy special from the comfort of his own home.

name: Harem Suare
summary_text: In Baghdad in the early 1900's, a young woman rises up through the ranks of power within the Ottoman Empire. She and a eunuch plan an elaborate scheme for the release of the female slaves.

name: Flower Drum Song
summary_text: A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

name: Hassan wa Morcus
summary_text: When the lives of Mahmoud, a Muslim Sheikh (Omar Sharif) and Boulos, a Christian Priest (Adel Imam) are threatened by religious extremists on both sides, the Egyptian government inducts ...                See full summary »

name: Dou hap

name: Bullets or Ballots
summary_text: When a crusader against rackets is murdered, a grand jury battles the rackets by promoting McLaren to be in charge of the cleanup. He fires NYPD Detective Blake, who punches him and joins the racket.

name: Itsy Bitsy
summary_text: Based on the centuries old poem, a family moves into a secluded mansion where they soon find themselves being targeted by an entity taking the form of a giant spider.

name: Sathuranga Vettai
summary_text: Ace conman Gandhi effortlessly thinks up schemes to swindle gullible and greedy folks. However on a rare occasion, things don't go according to plan and he ends up in the clutches of a ruthless gang who demand schemes from him for money.

name: Downloading Nancy
summary_text: An unhappy wife orders a guy she meets over the Internet to kill her, but the two of them fall in love.

name: A Garfield Christmas Special
summary_text: Garfield, Jon, and Odie go to Jon's grandmother's house for Christmas, where Garfield finds a present for Grandma.

name: Death Watch
summary_text: In a future where dying of illness is exceedingly rare, a terminally ill woman becomes a celebrity and a man with camera implants goes to secretly record her for a morbid TV show.

name: Closeness
summary_text: In the late-1990s squalid town of Nalchik, a poor young Jewish couple is kidnapped and a grievous ransom is demanded, as bitter resentments and cruel dilemmas come to light, magnifying the small community's grave predicament.

summary_text: A bisexual petty criminal named Bob encounters a married couple arguing in a bar. Bob breaks up the fight and proceeds to seduce first the wife and then the husband. Then Bob teaches the ...                See full summary »

summary_text: The "Angels", a San Pedro motorcycle gang, parties in the Coachella Valley's Palm Springs Indian Canyons, California, and wreaks havoc with the local police.

name: I Accuse My Parents
summary_text: Young man goes to work for gangsters to impress his nightclub-singer girlfriend.

name: The Navigators
summary_text: Five Yorkshiremen try to survive after the British Rail is bought out by a private company.

name: Iyi Aile Çocugu
summary_text: Cemal has a twin brother who is mafia and his name is also Cemal even they are raised by different families sometimes they effect each other as behaviours, speech etc. Somehow their life starts to come together without their knowledge.

name: Barrio
summary_text: A coming-of-age story in the vein of CITY OF GOD and KIDS - available for the first time in the U.S.!

name: Semi-Tough
summary_text: A three-way friendship between two free-spirited professional football players and the owner's daughter becomes compromised when two of them become romantically involved.

summary_text: Ozgur a young boy who lost his parents since childhood was heir to his grandfather's wealth but there is one condition that he has to live a while in a village otherwise it will be donated ...                See full summary »

summary_text: A privately funded Danish mission to find resources on Saturn replaces navigator last minute with incompetent Per. His ex tries to warn them. Unfortunately, there are aliens on Saturn who are interested in Earth's water.

name: Emanuelle and the Last Cannibals
summary_text: Photojournalist Emanuelle accompanies an anthropologist, two female missionary workers and a treacherous hunter's party in a trek through the Amazon to find a cannibalistic tribe long thought extinct.

name: They Might Be Giants
summary_text: In a Manhattan psychiatric hospital a man, convinced he is Sherlock Holmes, is treated by a female doctor who happens to be named Watson.

name: Faccia a faccia
summary_text: A history professor has a chance meeting with an infamous outlaw and eventually assumes leadership of his gang.

name: The Secret Garden
summary_text: A girl is sent to live with her uncle on his estate when her parents die. There she discovers much intrigue, family history and secrets and personal baggage. In particular, a screaming child and...a secret garden.

name: Speed Kills
summary_text: Speedboat racing champion and multimillionaire, Ben Aronoff, leads a double life that lands him in trouble with the law and drug lords.

name: Galaxina

name: Night and Day
summary_text: A fictionalized biopic of composer Cole Porter from his days at Yale in the 1910s through the height of his success to the 1940s.

name: Underworld
summary_text: Boisterous gangster kingpin Bull Weed rehabilitates his former lawyer from his alcoholic haze, but complications arise when he falls for Weed's girlfriend.

name: Awake
summary_text: A man wakes in a hospital bed with no recollection of who he is, and learns that he's wanted by the police for committing a series of murders.

name: Youth
summary_text: A look at the lives of members of a Military Cultural Troupe in the 1970s.

name: The Stoneman Murders
summary_text: In 1980s Bombay, a serial killer starts targeting homeless street dwellers, whilst a suspended police officer attempts to solve the case.

name: The Oak

name: Overlord
summary_text: During the Second World War a young lad is called up and, with an increasing sense of foreboding, undertakes his army training ready for D-day.

name: Afterimage
summary_text: The story of charismatic painter Wladyslaw Strzeminski, who opposed social realism and maintained his own artistic freedom in spite of political obstacles.

name: Éloge de l'amour
summary_text: An author works on a project on the subject of love, and, in the process, crosses paths with a former love in his life.

name: Aces: Iron Eagle III
summary_text: Chappy discovers a drug-smuggling scheme at his own air base. It turns out that the lives of some village people in Peru are at stake, and he decides to fly there with ancient airplanes and friends to free them.

name: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege
summary_text: A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong.

name: Sharaabi
summary_text: A workaholic businessman neglects his only son after his wife's death. The son grows up to be a rebellious alcoholic.

name: Dogs
summary_text: Roman returns to the land he has just inherited from his grandfather. Fully decided to sell this vast but desolate property, he is warned by the local cop that his grandfather was a local ...                See full summary »

name: Lost in Yonkers
summary_text: In the summer of 1942, two young boys are sent to stay with their stern grandmother and their childlike aunt in Yonkers, New York.

name: Hideaway
summary_text: Mousse and Louis are young, beautiful, rich and in love. But drugs have invaded their lives. One day, they overdose and Louis dies. Mousse survives, but soon learns she's pregnant. Feeling ...                See full summary »

name: Jesse Stone: Innocents Lost
summary_text: After his involuntary retirement, Jesse Stone investigates the suspicious death of a young friend while the Paradise police force deals with the arrogant new chief, who is the son-in-law of a town councilman.

name: Kautokeino-opprøret
summary_text: Religious and cultural reawakening inspires rebellion in a 19th century Norwegian village.

name: Identification of a Woman
summary_text: The movie director Niccolo has just been left by his wife. This gives him the idea of making a movie about women's relationships. He starts to search for a woman who can play the leading ...                See full summary »

name: New Year's Evil
summary_text: During a New Year's Eve celebration, a Los Angeles disc jockey receives a phone call saying that when New Year's strikes in each time zone, someone will be murdered - and she will be the last one.

name: Styx
summary_text: "Styx" depicts the transformation of a strong woman torn from her contented world during a sailing trip.

name: The Long Dumb Road
summary_text: Two guys serendipitously meet at a time when they both find themselves at personal crossroads and decide to embark on an unplanned road trip across the American Southwest.

name: Cameraman Gangatho Rambabu
summary_text: A fast-paced socially relevant political drama that revolves around the struggles of an ordinary citizen against crime and political corruption.

name: Heading South
summary_text: Three female tourists have their eyes opened while visiting the poverty-stricken and dangerous world of 1980s Haiti.

name: Aaahh Belinda
summary_text: After Serap, the theatre actress, acts in an advertisement, she loses her identity and become a housewife with two children. The movie is about dilemma of Serap and Naciye.

name: Fe de etarras
summary_text: Four Basque ETA terrorists, living together with peculiar Spanish neighbors, are planning a terrorist attack in Spain, but await instructions from the head of the organization.

name: Dinner with Friends
summary_text: Two married couples have their twelve-year bond of friendship put to the test when one couple reveals that they are splitting up.

name: Cleopatra Jones
summary_text: During the 1970s, U.S. Special Agent Cleopatra Jones proves to be an invaluable asset to the local police forces in the war on drugs.

name: Shaft's Big Score!
summary_text: Shaft is back to find the murderer of an old friend on the cold hard city streets with a little help from his new friends.

name: Ahora o nunca
summary_text: Narrates the preparation for a wedding of a Spanish couple in which everything goes wrong.

name: Just Like a Woman
summary_text: Two women get on the highway heading to Santa Fe. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a secret: she's a fugitive from justice - accused of her mother-in-law's death.

name: Burning Palms
summary_text: A subversive tale that interlaces five stories set in Los Angeles, where no taboo is left unexplored as each character careens toward a dark and often comic fate.

name: Half Moon
summary_text: Mamo, an old and legendary Kurdish musician living in Iran, plans to give one final concert in Iraqi Kurdistan. After seven months of trying to get a permit and rounding up his ten sons, he...                See full summary »

name: More
summary_text: Stefan, a recent college graduate, hitchhikes from Germany to Paris where he meets American expatriate, Estelle. They chase the sun to Ibiza. An idyllic island life degenerates when she introduces him to heroin and they get addicted.

name: Mea culpa
summary_text: Franck and Simon are both good cops and partners. Simon has been troubled since he killed three in a drunk driving accident, but when Simons son witnesses a murder, and is hunted by ruthless killers, he's efficiently back.

name: The Stranger
summary_text: A mysterious man arrives in a small American town seeking his wife, though his presence plunges the community into a bloodbath.

name: La banda dei Babbi Natale

name: Muthu
summary_text: The movie is about a loyal servant, Muthu (Rajni), working for Zamindar Malayasimman (Sarath Babu) and the cunning plans by the uncle of Malasimman to capture the whole wealth which uncovers some mystery about Muthu.

name: Voyage of the Damned
summary_text: The tragic 1939 voyage of SS St. Louis carrying hundreds of German Jewish refugees from Nazi Germany that seemingly no nation is willing to save from certain doom.
